summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3202, for the improvement of the alley in block 5, Capitol Hill Addition, Division No. 1, being the alley between 13th Avenue North and 14th Avenue North, from East Aloha Street to a point approximately 362 feet northerly thereof, all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 39547 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
